Straight Shot nodds, as she gently takes Elita into her own arms, cradling =
her body securely.

"It's okay, you can see your mom when she's all better,=
 and she will be better real soon.  But right now you can spend time with m=
e and I promise, you'll even get to see your Uncle, Tucson real soon too, h=
e's just taking a little nap right now, but when he's out of that he'll be =
really happy ta hear your voice."

She walks Elita back to where she knew t=
hey'd be safe.  In Tucson's private quarters where she had complete access,=
 due to the fact that she too shared this suite with her brother.  Inside, =
the quarters lead into his vast workshop, where everything is neat, organiz=
ed and categorized according to tool and material.  The quarters too are ke=
pt orderly, and clean.  She gently lays Elita down on her own berth, and si=
ts with her, gently rubbing her head with her hand.

"As soon as I hear any=
thing about your mom, we'll go right over to see her."
